display_name: [Universe 7's Final Will to Fight] Frieza (Final Form) (Angel) + Goku

kit.leader_skill: "Battle of Fate" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +220%

super_attack.name: Death Beam
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Lowers ATK

ultra_super_attack.name: Grudgeless Strike
ultra_super_attack.effect: Massively raises ATK and; greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage; A great chance of stunning the enemy

passive_skill.name: Frieza's Will to Fight
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +7; (Forever) ATK & DEF 200% up; (Forever) Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack; (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained; For 2 turns from the character's entry turn: "Representatives of Universe 7" or "Battle of Fate" Category allies' ATK & DEF 77% up; When attacking: ATK & DEF 150% up; Ki +7 and ATK 77% up when HP is 77% or less; When receiving an attack: Damage reduction rate 50% up when HP is 77% or less; When all allies attacking in the same turn are Super Class characters (self excluded): Performs a critical hit; Launches an additional Super Attack; When all allies attacking in the same turn are Extreme Class characters (self excluded): Launches 2 additional Super Attacks

lines.text: Ki +7
ATK & DEF 200% up
Launches an additional attack that has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack
Receives an additional Ki +2 per Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained
"Representatives of Universe 7" or "Battle of Fate" Category allies' ATK & DEF 77% up
lines.context: For 2 turns from the character's entry turn

lines.text: ATK & DEF 150% up
Ki +7 and ATK 77% up when HP is 77% or less
Damage reduction rate 50% up when HP is 77% or less
Performs a critical hit
lines.context: When all allies attacking in the same turn are Super Class characters (self excluded)

lines.text: Launches an additional Super Attack
lines.context: When all allies attacking in the same turn are Super Class characters (self excluded)

lines.text: Launches 2 additional Super Attacks
lines.context: When all allies attacking in the same turn are Extreme Class characters (self excluded)

lines.text: Meets up with Goku and can perform Reversible Exchange
lines.context: Starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle

reversible_exchange.condition: Starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle: Meets up with Goku and can perform Reversible Exchange

active_skill.name: Miracle of Universe 7
active_skill.effect: Greatly raises ATK temporarily,; causes ultimate damage to enemy; Within the turn activated,; all attacks become critical hits
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated starting from the 4th turn from the start of battle (once only, be it before or after Reversible Exchange)
